Book Thoughts Ep1 | Feel Good Productivity | Framing Outcomes

Aug 18, 2024

  • Famous youtuber Mark Rober set up an experiment which shows that simply changing the ‚Äòframe‚Äô, in this case just the working of a failure outcome can change the probability of trying again.
  • Simply giving yourself the feeling of more control and framing your failures as choices can increase motivation.
